personalInfo.name: Andrew King
personalInfo.title: AI/ML Engineer & Automation Systems Developer
personalInfo.subtitle: Industrial Robotics | Machine Learning | Controls Integration
personalInfo.tagline: AI/ML Engineer specializing in Industrial Robotics and Intelligent Automation Systems

professionalSummary.headline: AI/ML Engineer & Industrial Robotics Expert
professionalSummary.description: Experienced AI/ML engineer with deep expertise in industrial robotics and intelligent automation systems. 10+ years of applied experience spanning research, engineering, and full-stack development. Specialized in developing turn-key Machine Learning solutions for collaborative robotics, manufacturing optimization, and enterprise automation platforms using Python/FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and modern AI frameworks.
keyStrengths: Database Systems & Data Engineering (PostgreSQL, Vector DBs)

responsibilities: Architect enterprise AI/ML applications using Python/FastAPI backends with React/TypeScript frontends in multi-tenant SaaS architectures

Project Moose (ICS Security Platform) - Lead Python/FastAPI development with AI-powered threat intelligence using Model Context Protocol (MCP), Shodan API integration, and automated vulnerability assessment systems
Project Honeybee (FinTech Platform) - Built complete MERN stack system with ML-driven KYC/AML automation, regulatory compliance workflows, and microservices deployment on Azure
Project Wolf (IoT Platform) - Developed Ignition-based Docker containers for real-time IoT data processing, edge computing integration, and industrial hardware management with cellular/LoRa networks
Lead controls system designer for automated clean-in-place systems with automotive-grade reliability standards in Food and Beverage industry
Design and implement AI-enhanced process control systems for valve, temperature, and pressure management with real-time optimization algorithms
Developed AI-integrated inventory database using computer vision and image recognition with projected cost savings of +$1M over 2025
Implemented standardized programming templates and automated documentation systems, reducing design time by 15% through intelligent workflow optimization
Designed AI-enhanced semiconductor automation system using SCARA robots for wafer handling with intelligent path planning and Bosch servo control via TCP socket messaging
Developed autonomous mobile coffee kiosk with ML-driven customer interaction, MQTT communication, SCARA robot integration, and Beckhoff controls
Implemented robot welding applications with KUKA systems using computer vision guidance and adaptive control algorithms
Managed automated risk assessment systems for production environments and developed ML-based predictive maintenance solutions
Advanced AI education cooperative focused on industrial applications of large language models and autonomous systems
Developed embeddings analysis tool processing +75k messages in PostgreSQL database for manufacturing knowledge management systems
Implemented K-means clustering and semantic analysis algorithms to automatically categorize and retrieve technical documentation
Research focus on integrating LLMs with industrial automation and robotics control systems
Led comprehensive upgrade of industrial fiber laser CNC system, replacing IPG 750W with Raycus 2.2kW through data-driven project management
Implemented automotive-grade safety standards with dual-channel E-Stop interlocks and intelligent monitoring systems
Applied systematic troubleshooting methodologies and diagnostic algorithms to resolve complex electrical integration challenges
Integrated intelligent roll-to-roll manufacturing systems for laminated circuit materials with automated quality control
Developed OPC-UA client systems for recipe management with enterprise-wide data integration and real-time analytics
Created advanced HMI applications using Ignition Perspective and Allen Bradley PanelView with data visualization and performance monitoring
Implemented ML-enhanced error-proofing systems and predictive analytics that reduced equipment downtime by 25%
Developed standardized PLC programming frameworks using Allen Bradley RSLogix 5000 and Studio 5000 with modular, reusable code architecture
Designed intelligent robot cells with Siemens PLC integration for automated de-palletizing with adaptive control algorithms
Created computer vision-guided EOAT solutions enhancing precision in automated parts handling and quality inspection
Implemented RIA 15.06 compliant safety systems with intelligent area scanners and adaptive light curtain configurations
Led $250K automation project integrating Allen Bradley PLC and advanced HMI systems for case packing and palletizing with real-time optimization
Managed Universal Robots deployment achieving 6-second cycle time with ±1mm precision for injection molding through adaptive control algorithms
Integrated robotics safety circuits with comprehensive risk assessment algorithms and predictive failure detection
Developed performance monitoring systems using statistical analysis to increase reliability and reduce robotic cell downtime

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin

keyAchievements: Architected AI-powered threat intelligence platform using FastAPI, Model Context Protocol, and machine learning algorithms
Developed computer vision system for inventory management with projected $1M+ cost savings through automated image recognition
Built embeddings analysis tool processing 75k+ messages with K-means clustering for manufacturing knowledge management
Reduced manufacturing design time by 15% through intelligent automation templates and workflow optimization
Achieved 6-second cycle time with ±1mm precision in robotic systems through adaptive ML control algorithms
Implemented predictive analytics systems reducing equipment downtime by 25% across multiple manufacturing environments
Successfully deployed multi-tenant SaaS architectures using Python/FastAPI, React/TypeScript, and PostgreSQL
Led $250K automation integration project with advanced HMI systems and real-time performance monitoring

personalQualities.description: Proven ability to integrate cutting-edge AI/ML technologies into industrial applications, from computer vision systems to predictive analytics
Expert in designing end-to-end solutions from database architecture to frontend interfaces using modern frameworks and cloud technologies
Systematic approach to complex technical challenges using data-driven analysis, machine learning algorithms, and automated optimization
Unique combination of industrial robotics, automation controls, and modern AI/ML development enabling innovative integrated solutions
Actively engaged in AI research community, staying current with latest developments in LLMs, automation frameworks, and industrial applications
Experience leading complex technical projects and mentoring teams in both traditional automation and emerging AI/ML technologies
